show.title: The Daughter-in-Law Who Married Far Away
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/Z3PvA9
show.description: A wealthy and powerful mother discovers that her beloved daughter is silently suffering under the hands of a charming but abusive husband. Watch Mother of Revenge — where justice isn’t served in court, but in silence, strategy, and a mother’s unstoppable rage.
show.description_secondary: A wealthy and powerful mother discovers that her beloved daughter is silently suffering under the hands of a charming but abusive husband. Watch Mother of Revenge — where justice isn’t served in court, but in silence, strategy, and a mother’s unstoppable rage.
